testcase.name: prodectSelection

failure.message: The following asserts failed: The button text is not valid, Expected 'Add to cart' got :REMOVE expected [ADD TO CART] but found [REMOVE], The button click function is not working:the cart count must be decreased: result got: 1 expected [0] but found [1]
